page.title: 16Kilmaurs Gala Week (1)
page.content:
The village Gala Week, which is financed by the villagers and Community Association, is usually held in the first week in June. Prior to this, the local Primary 7 children meet and write an essay on a given subject, usually concerned with the village. The girl whose essay is judged to be the best is the Gala Queen for that year, the two runners-up being her attendants. The boy whose essay is chosen is the Champion and he has one helper. "Miss Kilmaurs", "Mini Miss" and "Teeny Miss" are elected at discos.
Celebrations, which continue throughout the week, include tennis and bowling tournaments, discos,fancy dress competition, puppet show and concert.
